column5: Fallfish, herring and sucker.  Big spoons.
maybe 12 " suckers lol..... 12 foot suckers? maybe your the reason for the declining sturgeon.lol Just messing with you dsn........
Do the Suckers have to be Alive, or like the Herring can you bring them dead in salt!

I find you don't have to go with the "huge" baits in the spring since the natural forage fish are still smaller.  Fall though, is a different story-that's when to break out the big ol' sucker minnows.

When my bro and I fish for monster pike at Lake Dalrymple we bought 12 foot suckers and used a quick strike rig and a monster float. We got 15+ pounders there. The bigger the minnow the bigger the fish.
12 foot suckers, or 12, 1 foot suckers ? lol.
